caption.p:
Observed and modeled correlations between summer precipitation and mean daily maximum temperature. Spatial patterns in the correlation between mean daily maximum temperature (Tx) and precipitation (Pr) of the Boreal (JJA) and Austral (DJF) summer are generally consistent between a CRU TS3.23
44 precipitation stations and b the six-model ensemble mean of CMIP5 historicalNat simulations. To reduce overplotting, point size of precipitation stations is proportional to distance from theÂ third nearest station
